sentence.Network_en: He was not a paragon. He would never be perfect.

sentence.Network_cn: 我没有说过自己是完人。

sentence.Network_cn: 他被认为是品德尽善尽美的典范.

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 16th cent.: from obsolete French, from Italian paragone 'touchstone to try good (gold) from bad', from medieval Greek parakonē 'whetstone'

encyclopedia.content: 欧洲时间3月26日晚9点28分，欧服闪电之刃服务器Paragon成为世界第一个击败25人英雄模式巫妖王的公会！这也是Paragon公会继3月3日拿下10人英雄模式巫妖王的世界FD后的又一壮举，令特意全公会转服过去与他们竞争的Ensidia公会大失面子。 Paragon转战美服，并与美服公会Premonition合并，合并后新的公会名称为Paranition.此系Paragon开的愚人节玩笑，切不可当真。 Paragon在ICC的表现似乎被人们视为半路杀出的程咬金，不过从T8时代他

entry.tran: 杰出典范；尽善尽美的人；完人
entry.def: If you refer to someone as a paragon, you mean that they are perfect or have a lot of a good quality.

example.ex: We don't expect candidates to be paragons of virtue.
example.tran: 我们不指望候选人在道德上尽善尽美。

example.ex: ...a paragon of neatness, efficiency and reliability...
example.tran: 整洁、高效和可靠的典范

means.word_mean: 1. an ideal instance; a perfect embodiment of a concept
2. model of excellence or perfection of a kind; one having no equal

auth_sentence.content: I'm not casting myself as a long-suffering paragon.
auth_sentence.res_content: I'm not casting myself as a long-suffering paragon.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I'm not casting myself as a long-suffering paragon.

auth_sentence.content: Even the children applauded this paragon of a father.
auth_sentence.res_content: Even the children applauded this paragon of a father.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Even the children applauded this paragon of a father.

auth_sentence.content: He hated being regarded as a paragon of anything.
auth_sentence.res_content: He hated being regarded as a paragon of anything.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: He hated being regarded as a paragon of anything.

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. 表示"半,类似,辅助"; 2. 表示"降落伞"; 3. 表示"在旁边"

stems_affixes.word_buile: para半,类似,辅助+all全部+el→全部都很类似→类似的→匹敌

stems_affixes.value_cn: 准军事性的,起军事辅助作用的
stems_affixes.word_buile: para半,类似,辅助+military军事的→准军事的
para半,类似,辅助+political政治的→adj.半政治的
para半,类似,辅助+state国+al的→adj.半官方的
para在旁边+bol抛+ic的→adj.抛物线[状]的
para在旁边+noid=note注意→在旁边注意→怀疑的
para半,类似,辅助+legal法律的→辅助法律的
para半,类似,辅助+medic医师,实习医生→n.护理人员
para半,类似,辅助+phrase措词→v.解释 n.解释
para降落伞+chut落下+e→n.降落伞
para降落伞+drop扔下→n.空投,空降

stems_affixes.value_cn: 伞兵部队, 空降部队
stems_affixes.word_buile: para降落伞+troop部队+s→n.伞兵部队, 空降部队
para在旁边+digm显示→在旁边显示给[别人]→示范
para在旁边+dox观点→观点边上有观点→矛盾
para在旁边+gon角→旁边顶尖人物→典范
para在旁边+log说话逻辑+ism现象,状态→在逻辑边上→不是逻辑
para旁边+sit坐+e→坐在在旁边[吃]→吃白食→寄生虫,食客
para半,类似,辅助+all全部+el→全部都很类似→类似的→匹敌
para半,类似,辅助+phrase措词→v.解释 n.解释

stems_affixes.value_cn: 使瘫痪[麻痹];使丧失作用
stems_affixes.word_buile: para在旁边+lyze分开→旁边分开→瘫痪

means.word_mean: 十全十美的人；完美无缺的人

sentences.en: He was considered to be a paragon of virtue.
sentences.cn: 他被认为是品德尽善尽美的典范。

sentences.en: Unfortunately we can’t expect all policemen to be paragons of virtue.
sentences.cn: 不幸的是，我们不能期望所有的警察都十全十美。
